english.segment1: Come on, come on, come on to the future. Come all, come all the way. Come on, come on, come on to the future. The future is arranged.
english.segment2: Can you see it?. You know the future's in my sight. Invisible kingdom. collides with space and time. The universe has been ordered, yeah.
english.segment4: Stepping over, stepping in the age to come. Can you feel it?. Unstoppable power. The universe has been ordered, yeah.
english.segment6: Hold tight, hold on. The future's on its way. Run hard, run strong. The future's on its way. It can't stop, it can't stop. Here it comes. straight for you, head on. Here it comes.
